COMMENTS: Description of datasets available for CMCT comparisons

ers1-cmctnc-wgselev-ant.desc: ers1 elevations, WGS84 ellipsoid, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF

ers1-cmctnc-egmmtelev-ant.desc: ers1 GLAS elevations, EGM08 mean-tide, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF

ers1-cmctnc-egmtfelev-ant.desc: ers1 GLAS elevations, EGM08 tide-free, Antarctica, CMCT netCDF
